POST.Content-Type: Indicates the media type of the request body
POST.Content-Encoding: Indicates the compression method used on the message body
POST.Content-Language: Describes the natural language(s) of the intended audience for the content
POST.Content-Length: Indicates the size of the body

GET.Accept: Specifies the media types the client is willing to accept
GET.Cookie: Sends cookies from the client to the server
GET.If-None-Match: It's used to specify that the server should only return the resource if it has been modified since the provided ETag
GET.If-Modified-Since: Similar to If-None-Match but uses the resource's modification timestamp instead of an ETag.

DELETE.Authorization: This header is used to include credentials for authenticating the client with the server
DELETE.If-Match: Compares ETags to check if a resource is unaltered; proceeds if matched, else returns 412
DELETE.If-Unmodified-Since: Checks if resource's modification time precedes a specified timestamp; proceeds if true, else returns 412.
